about.heading: Who we are
about.title: Nacht der Wissenschaft @ KIT
about.body:
The ‘Nacht der Wissenschaft is a university group at the Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT). Since 2016, it has been organising the event of the same name, at which students from various disciplines volunteer to organise exciting lecture series.
Our goal is to bring science to life.
If you would like to contribute your own ideas or become part of the organisation, please feel free to contact us!
supporters.heading: Support
seo.description: Nacht der Wissenschaft at KIT: schedule, highlights, and information for the event on 21 November 2025.
speaker: Speaker:
about.us.first.paragraph: Behind the ‘Nacht der Wissenschaft’ is a student initiative at KIT. Since 2016, the event of the same name has been planned, organised and thematically designed anew each year. Throughout the year, the group meets regularly, approaches professors for lectures and develops a coherent concept for the evening based on ideas.
about.us.second.paragraph: If you would like to contribute your own ideas or help with the organisation, please contact us at info@ndw-ka.de.

thank.you.supporters: We would like to thank our supporters:
